PCEA MEMBLEY SCHOOL
Admissions Prospectus Summary

School: PCEA Membley School
Location: Membley Estate, Church Road, Ruiru, Kiambu County, Kenya
Phone: +254 756 428 414
Email: pceasmembleyschool@gmail.com

Admission Classes:
- Pre-Primary (PP1, PP2)
- Primary (Grade 1 - Grade 6)
- Junior Secondary (Grade 7 - Grade 9)

Required Documents:
- Completed admission form
- Birth certificate copy
- Parent/guardian ID copy
- Two passport photographs
- Latest school report (for transfers)

Support Contacts:
- Admissions: pceasmembleyschool@gmail.com (Subject: Admissions Inquiry)
- Accounts: pceasmembleyschool@gmail.com (Subject: Accounts Inquiry)

Visit contact.html on the website to send an inquiry and schedule a school tour.
